summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Board of Adjustment (Panel C) of the City of Dallas will convene on February 20, 2025, with a briefing at 10:30 A.M. followed by a public hearing at 1:00 P.M. The meeting will take place at Dallas City Hall, L1FN Auditorium, and will also be accessible via videoconference. The purpose of the meeting is to address various zoning and variance requests from residents and to facilitate public input.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
The agenda includes a staff presentation, public hearing, and public testimony. It will cover uncontested items, holdover items, and individual cases requiring decisions on variance applications and special exceptions related to zoning regulations.

**Important Details**:  
Significant proposals include requests for variances concerning floor area, building height, side and rear yard setbacks, and special exceptions for single-family use regulations at 2172 Jordan Valley Road. Additional requests involve special exceptions for front-yard setback regulations for a carport at 11224 Russwood Circle, fence height regulations at 5414 Falls Road, and landscape conservation regulations at 1900 Wheatland Road and 7915 S. Lancaster Road.

**Action Items**:  
The Board is seeking approval for the minutes from the January 23, 2025 meeting and will deliberate on multiple variance and special exception requests, including those from Alejandro Arroyo and Marcelo Barron. Decisions will be made on whether to grant the requested variances and exceptions as outlined in the agenda.
